name: Harbor Town Pub
description: Pincraft Pinball is the premier pinball operator in San Diego! To report problems contact mark@pincraftpinball.com or 860-287-2137.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: I played 1 game but did terrible. I would like to blame the game but everything was working :P 11-16

machine_conditions.comment: I played 1 game but did terrible. I would like to blame the game but everything was working :P 11-16
Appreciate the comments, and never thought it didn't happen as the nature of pinball is very fickle...and please excuse the exclamation points but pinball is very exciting to me! ;)

The exclamation points aren’t needed at end of your comments.
The ball got stuck and the pin did not go into find mode.  That’s a fact, and I wouldn’t make it up.  I could of shook it, but I don’t want to cause any damage.  Someone must have rebooted before you saw it.
Played a few games and everything was working properly!
We were playing it the night before with no issues...will check it out tomorrow!

After multiball, flipped ball back into No Way Out Lock channel and ball did not come out.  Machine did not go into find mode.  Just hung up and stayed on ball 3 with repetitive annoying music playing.  Left it.  A gip at a $1 a game.
That issue has been resolved. Owner took it apart and addressed. Plays great!
Ball can get stuck on ramp just behind and to the left of the Yetti. Ball search can’t locate.  Have to tilt to free it.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Played OK. A little floaty but you can make all ramps and everything works. 11-16

machine_conditions.comment: Played OK. A little floaty but you can make all ramps and everything works. 11-16

Leftshoe made that comment over a year ago. I play this one all the time. Played eight games today over lunch. The plates don’t interfere with the ramps at all - they work just fine. Next time the owner does regular maintenance he can bend these back for aesthetics.

What leftshoe meant by left ramps being jacked is that the metal base flap is supposed to be touching down on the playfield, not bent upwards creating a 1/4 inch gap.  Yes both left ramps are makeable, but not 100% of the time.
Was there today and was able to make the left ramp shot no problem...play better!
Left ramp metal flap is jacked.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: So game works wel has hyper loop problems are 1 per play no break and 35% of the time ur plunge literally does a big arch and lands directly in the left out lane..😂 it’s like a cruel joke.. ur watching it like yay I get to play them nope! Done. Now sometimes u even get a ball save. But guess what most the time it does THE SAME EXACT THING LOL.. tilt set pretty sensitive so u gotta be REALLY careful if u try n bump it out of the death arch. Sometimes it doesn’t even help because it lands so perfectly with momentum in the out lane ur just screwed. It’s really nuts when it does it to ur saved ball too! 😂 I was cussing up a storm lol.  Believe and trust I told the worker that he needed to have the boss refuckulate it cuz I won’t be spending any more money til that’s done.. anyways there u have it

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Upper right side flipper rubber is broken and stuck under the flipper. It's not 100% disabled though. I was able to hit the comic store guy but unable to get the ball in the upper play field. The ball got stuck in the back a few times but with the tilt sensitivity turned way down I was able to aggressively shake the ball loose. Also massive glare on the glass from the back board. Oh, one more thing, the coin op was taped up BUT it will eagerly take your paper money. I still played and had fun but I would suggest finding another location until it gets some love.[SAW]

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Not very playable.  Constantly has to look for ball

machine_conditions.comment: Not very playable.  Constantly has to look for ball

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Back in action. Plays pretty well with the exception of a sporadic missed registered right ramp due to a weak shot so MAKE the shot cleanly! During multiball it takes its time to eject the locked balls from the reel. By the time the 3rd ball is released, ball save is gone.

machine_conditions.comment: Back in action. Plays pretty well with the exception of a sporadic missed registered right ramp due to a weak shot so MAKE the shot cleanly! During multiball it takes its time to eject the locked balls from the reel. By the time the 3rd ball is released, ball save is gone.

9/6/19: Was lit up, but with posted "Out of Order" / awaiting service notice.

[Warning: Don't get bit by the NO RIGHT TURN ON RED @ Bernardo Ctr. Dr. exit off the northbound 15 !  Moto cops ARE aggressively ticketing this.]

2/1/19:  Major Fail !  The "resets itself during multiball" problem reported previously in 2016 & 2017 has returned !  Can't put quarters in with any confidence until this has been investigated and corrected.
11/27/18: only played one game, but it looked to be playing O.K.  Hope the previously noted issues have been corrected.
5/10/17 -- sudden divert into Testing Mode / diagnostics right in the middle of multiball play is simply **unacceptable** . . .  even tho' I had already scored a Replay !
9/13/17 -- SDTM problem during multi-ball is back (or maybe just was never really fixed ?).  Add that to to the 100 Mil. replay level, and I'll pass on this one for a good while.
7/2/17 -- was playing O.K. on this visit.  Longstanding SDTM problem during multiball did not show up this time, but hesitate to call it "fixed" on the basis of just 4 games played . . . .

8/11/16 -- Major Fail !  Machine Reset itself for testing at the beginning of multiball, wiping out the game in progress.  SDTM issue appears to have returned as well. (The latter should just involve a basic adjustment.) Avoid unit these have been fixed.

7/21/17 -- seemed to be working O.K.; did not encounter the SDTM firing during multiball; unsure about the former boat ramp issue.  Replay level set perhaps a tad high for average players, but now much more reasonable than it had been.
Was turned OFF on 5/19/16 -- see past notes; no reason to think those issues have been addressed.
1/13/16 -- Switch in Starboard boat ramp is not working.  Multiball feeds balls SDTM (straight down the middle), a serious problem in game play.
11-Dec-15 --  Was working without any notable issues.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Up and running. Plays pretty well. Hadn’t played a LotR in a while so it was nice to play a working one! Put a GC score.

machine_conditions.comment: Up and running. Plays pretty well. Hadn’t played a LotR in a while so it was nice to play a working one! Put a GC score.
9/6/19: Was lit up but with a (tattered) "Out of Order" notice over the coin mechs.

11/27/18: This RT Pizza location has undergone a nice remodel, and the pins have never looked this good -- a combination of room lighting & pf LEDs.  Some of the DMD is starting to fade, but otherwise this LOTR seemed to be playing well.

5/10/18 -- (comment above for FT should  also have read "5/10/2018").  R. flipper response can *still* bug out intermittently, costing you a ball.  Initial characters you *should be* adding with their shots seems to be returning "___ Rings of Men" scoring, instead.
9/13/17 -- R. flipper response was cutting out intermittently. I'm guessing any Ball Save is turned OFF too. Another pin I'll be skipping for some time.
Date on the previous comment is incorrect.  7/2/17 -- seemed to be playing O.K.  (Has a history of a flipper being out of alignment, so keep a lookout for that.)
7/21/17 -- did not notice any problems on this visit.
5/19/16 -- L. flipper fails intermittently, enough so that it's unreliable.  (Did not bother checking re the previously noted issues.)

1/13/16 -- often is loading three balls at a time; is in a wacky state of continuous multiball modes; R. return wireform often holds up a ball from the VUK (prior to the Ball Lock location), which condition has existed for some time now.
29-Dec-2015: L. ball trough sensor issue appears to have been corrected.
11-Dec-2015 -- Left ball trough sensor (Samwise) cannot detect presence of a ball, bringing game to a halt and forcing you to tilt in order to dislodge it.
4/15/15 -- Replacing their long-running Machine Bride, which needed some work.  No idea if this LOTR is the LE version, but it was in primo condition.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: 11/27/18: most likely the same table that has been at this location off & on in the past; it seemed to be playing well at today's visit.

machine_conditions.comment: 11/27/18: most likely the same table that has been at this location off & on in the past; it seemed to be playing well at today's visit.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Mystery sensor fixed as well ad wire ramp.  Game works great.

machine_conditions.comment: Mystery sensor fixed as well ad wire ramp.  Game works great.

"Mystery" sensor doesn't work so ball gets stuck until reset. Ball also gets stuck above left ramp in wire lane and only gets free from another ball crashing into it or game resetting and adding another ball.
Game playing great, no noticeable issues
General GI lighting is out, game is dark and hard to see the ball.

name: West End
description: Pincraft Pinball is the premier pinball operator in San Diego! To report problems contact mark@pincraftpinball.com or 860-287-2137.

location_machine_xrefs.condition:
$0.50 per play, 3 balls. 
The machine has NO sound. The test car fires the ball into the hole in the bottom more than 50% of the time (and you don't get your ball saved). Play is fun, but def. could use some work. 
18 Million is the replay score at this time.

machine_conditions.comment:
$0.50 per play, 3 balls. 
The machine has NO sound. The test car fires the ball into the hole in the bottom more than 50% of the time (and you don't get your ball saved). Play is fun, but def. could use some work. 
18 Million is the replay score at this time.

2-4-17. No sound. Apron card says 75 cents but it's only 50 cents. Test car fires SDTM about 1/2 the time. Playfield is a bit dirty and cab. is beat. Still plays ok but needs to be fixed a bit. Replay 20,000,000. [JKN]

11-19-16. Not at all bad condition. Indeed its been used, but it plays and everything works, however the test car scoop tends to fire SDTM, but tilt is loose so you can lightly nudge it. Replay 20,000,000. [JKN]
Its terrible
